article.title: GD to Awarded More Than $385 Million to Replace Antiquated Radar
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: General Dynamics C4 Systems, Scottsdale, Arizona, was awarded a $385,550,000 firm-fixed-price and fixed-price-incentive-firm contract for the replacement of antiquated radars at four Army Test Centers with state of the art test-oriented equipment.Â The U.S. Army Contracting Command, Redstone Arsenal, Alabama, is the contracting activity.
